means: 抄袭，剽窃( crib的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: I didn't know the answers so I cribbed them off Joan.
sentence.Network_cn: 我不会答这几道题,所以就抄了琼的.

sentence.Network_en: I didn't know the answers to the teacher's questions so I cribbed them off John.
sentence.Network_cn: 我不知道教师出题的答案,便抄袭了约翰的.

sentence.Network_en: How could it have been cribbed? "

cribb 克里布, cribbed 木垛的, cribb 金亚德

list.abs: 为此，普通诉讼法庭中专门为他们划出一块地方，四周围以栏杆，类似于儿童用的童床（The crib），所以学徒在法庭上又被人们称作…
crib blanket 粗毯crib cloth 粗筛布crib comforter 婴儿床被
...怀特．史密斯(Brian Wild Smith)的圣诞马槽(Christmas crib)，等等都是玩具书中的经典名家的代表杰作。
进出口专业英语词汇(C8) ... crib mattress cover 婴儿床垫套 crib mattress 婴儿床垫 crib mosquito net 罩式蚊帐.

entry.def: A crib is a bed for a small baby.
If you crib, you copy something that someone else has written and pretend that it is your own work.

example.ex: You have been cribbing from Bennett...
He had been caught cribbing in an exam.

auth_sentence.content: His truths cannot be "cabined, cribbed, confined, bound in," to anyone's tribal ambitions.

auth_sentence.content: Your desperate need to be proven "right" is childish and counterproductive to your own cribbed arguments.
